name: Medical Knowledge
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 100%

醫學知識
의학 지식
Savoir médical
Medizinisches Wissen
Conocimiento médico
desc_short: Nullify poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone
中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化無效
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 무효
Annule poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification
Annuliert Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Anula ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie
desc_long: Nullifies poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone.
中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化無效。
독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 무효화합니다.
Annule poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification
Annuliert Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
Anula veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confunsión, enfermedad y piedra.
